member.name: T:Tizen.Network.WiFiDirect.WiFiDirectManager
member.summary:
A class which is used to manage settings of Wi-Fi Direct.
This class is used to discover peer devices and manage settings of Wi-Fi Direct.

member.value: A property to check whether the Wifidirect is initialized or not.
member.remarks: If it is not initialized, false will be returned.
member.exception: The required feature is not supported.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.WiFiDirect.WiFiDirectManager.StartDiscovery(System.Boolean,System.Int32,Tizen.Network.WiFiDirect.WiFiDirectDiscoveryChannel)
member.summary: Starts discovery to find all P2P capable devices.
member.param: Listen status.If False, then cycle between Scan and Listen.If True, then skip the initial 802.11 Scan and enter Listen state.
Duration of discovery period, in seconds.
Discovery channel.It is optional, default enum value FullScan is assigned.
member.remarks: Wi-Fi Direct must be activated. If this succeeds, DiscoveryStateChanged and PeerFound event will be invoked.
member.exception: The object is in invalid state.
The required feature is not supported.
Thrown when application does not have privilege to access this method.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.WiFiDirect.WiFiDirectManager.CancelDiscovery
member.remarks: Discovery must be started by StartDiscovery. If this succeeds, DiscoveryStateChanged and PeerFound event will be invoked.
member.exception: The object is in invalid state.
The required feature is not supported.
Thrown when application does not have privilege to access this method.

member.summary: Sets the Wi-Fi Display parameters for the WFD IE of local device.
member.param: WFD Device Type: define the Role of WFD device like source or sink.
Specifies Session Management Control Port number. It should be 2 bytes(0~65535).
CP support bit: (1 = enable the hdcp support, 0 = disable the hdcp support).
member.remarks: Wi-Fi Direct must be activated and WFD must be enabled.

member.remarks: Wi-Fi Direct must be activated.
member.exception: Thrown when the Wi-Fi Direct is not supported.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.WiFiDirect.WiFiDirectPeer.StartServiceDiscovery(Tizen.Network.WiFiDirect.WiFiDirectServiceType)
member.summary: Starts the Wi-Fi Direct service discovery.
member.remarks: Wi-Fi Direct must be activated. If this succeeds, the ServiceStateChanged event will be invoked.
member.exception: Thrown during one of the following cases: 1. When the Wi-Fi Direct is not supported. 2. When the Wi-Fi Direct service discovery is not supported.

member.name: M:Tizen.Network.WiFiDirect.WiFiDirectPeer.CancelServiceDiscovery(Tizen.Network.WiFiDirect.WiFiDirectServiceType)
member.summary: Stops the Wi-Fi Direct service discovery.
member.remarks: Wi-Fi Direct must be activated.
member.exception: Thrown during one of the following cases: 1. When the Wi-Fi Direct is not supported. 2. When the Wi-Fi Direct service discovery is not supported.

member.name: T:Tizen.Network.WiFiDirect.WiFiDirectPersistentGroup
member.summary: A class to handle persistent groups.

member.name: P:Tizen.Network.WiFiDirect.WiFiDirectPersistentGroup.MacAddress
member.summary: The MAC address of the persistent group owner.

member.name: P:Tizen.Network.WiFiDirect.WiFiDirectPersistentGroup.Ssid
member.summary: The SSID (Service Set Identifier) of the persistent group owner.
